projects.title: Viney Vibes - Mobile Game
projects.teaser:
Created by Andrés Fernández, Dave Schaub, and Tyler Nellissen
Released on the Apple and Google Play Stores on February 10, 2021
Please look forward to upcoming updates
projects.description: Viney Vibes, a mobile game built using Unity and C#, is about growing a vine as tall as you can. As you place pieces on the board, you maneuver around obstacles, collect pickups, and manage your limited number of pieces. At the same time, the vine is growing below, speeding up the higher you go. How tall can you grow the vine? Find out today!

projects.title: Spark - Discord Bot
projects.teaser:
Written to manage my Discord friend group's server
Purpose is to manage lists in dedicated channels
Other features include link shortcuts, coin flips, and dice rolls
projects.description: Spark is a list-managing Discord bot written in JavaScript. It utilizes the DiscordJS library alongside NodeJS. It was created to manage a growing Discord community where a group watched TV shows and played games, but wanted to keep track of what to watch or do next.
projects.description2: With a series of commands, Spark can add a TV show to a list, an event to a list, and change the status of a show. These lists are viewable in dedicated channels, so they are easily accessible. Spark can also take a random show from one list or a random event from another in the case that the group can't decide what to do. The bot can also flip a coin, produce a random number, and send links to the chat as a shorthand.

projects.title: Christmas Classics Visualization
projects.teaser:
Created in Visualization, Fall 2020
This tool allows you to explore Christmas lyrics in various contexts
projects.description:
This visualization explores Christmas music lyrics over the years. Users can
explore lyric data of individual songs and compare lyrical freqeuncy between
songs to make new discoveries. While the project is limited by its lyric data
set, it achieves the purpose the team set out to accomplish. Credit to Yun Tong
and Joseph Fallait.
